Text: EPRM HoustonSpeaker I would like to remind you that the room block at The Houstonian Hotel where the above mentioned event is being held is about to expire After Friday th April you will not be able to take advantage of the discounted rooms that are being held there Please book your accommodation ASAP to take advantage of this offer Contact the hotel directly and say that you are part of the RISK conference on May Risk waters Group do not book accommodation for speakers you have to contact them yourself directly If you have not already sent me a short biography and your speaker checklist please do so at your earliest convenience Kind Regards Layla OLeary Event Coordinator Risk Waters Group Haymarket house Haymarket London SWY RX Tel Fax

Speaker May I remind you that the final date for submitting your docs is Friday th April I need to have them by pm my time If you will not be able to get your presentation to me please can you ensure that you bring copies to the event Please confirm receipt You are cordially invited to the Cocktail Reception sponsored by New York Mercantile Exchange Inc in the Exhibition Hall and the Congress Dinner at Paraiso Maravilla on Monday May Paraiso Maravilla is just minutes from the Houstonian Hotel and Conference Center and boasts Mediterranean architecture and the reverent feel of an ol d Spanish mission Well known as Houstons most intriguing and beautiful venue the Paraiso Maravilla has indoor and outdoor stone fountains th Century handcarved arches that sit amidst the lush banana trees hibiscus and a touch of wrought iron You are surrounded by massive stone altars stucco walls lined with ivy Saltillo marble and floortoceiling fireplaces Transport to the restaurant will be provided Departure from the Houstonian Hotel from pm PLEASE SIGN AND FAX EMAIL BACK THIS PAGE IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO ATTEND THE DINNER I from confirm attendance at the dinner to be held at Paraiso Maravilla on Monday th May Signed Date If we do not receive your signed confirmation we will assume you cannot attend Fax Email Layla OLeary Event Coordinator Risk Waters Group Haymarket house Haymarket London SWY RX Tel Fax Layla OLeary Event Coordinator Risk Waters Group Haymarket house Haymarket London SWY RX Tel Fax Picture Picture
